item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Brussels rebuffs UK bid to prise open access to EU single market
2. Trump claims to have received call from Xi and to have cut ‘200 deals’ on trade
3. US judge arrested in escalation of immigration crackdown
4. Contender to succeed Jay Powell blames Fed for ‘systematic errors’
5. No crown, no glory: Pope Francis breaks with centuries of funeral rites
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
